version_description: Bug fix, promote stability
Bug fixes and stabilization

Update Dark Mode
Bug fixes and optimizations
Bug fixes and optimizations

Bug fixed.
Improve game convenience.
Fixed an issue with Facebook login

New feature: Guilds
Two new Cookies
Bug fixes and other improvements
Bug fixes and other improvements

- New Сookie: Almond Cookie
- New events & packages
- Bug fixes and other improvements
- Fixed a bug that caused one of the package items to be unavailable for purchase
Bug fixes and other improvements

- New Episodes 9 and 10 have been added
- The maximum level for Cookies has been raised from Lv. 50 to Lv. 60
- The maximum level for the Cookie Castle has been raised from Lv. 12 to Lv. 15
- New Cookies: Pure Vanilla Cookie and Black Raisin Cookie
- Bug fixes and other improvements

- Fixed bugs in certain Cookies' skills.
- Slightly modified the skill description texts of certain Cookies' skills.
- Pilgrim's Slingshot now reduces the rearmost enemy's DEF.
- Bug fixes and other improvements

- New feature: Cookie Castle Designs
- New Cookie: Strawberry Crepe Cookie
- New Event: 10M Kingdoms Super Raffle
- Bug fixes and other improvements

- New mode: Tower of Sweet Chaos
- New feature: merge Cookie Houses
- New Cookies: Pastry Cookie (EPIC), Fig Cookie (EPIC)
- Bug fixes and other improvements

- New feature: Sugar Gnome Laboratory
> Learn technologies to upgrade your Cookies and other various features in your Kingdom!
- New Cookies: Red Velvet Cookie (EPIC), Devil Cookie (RARE)
- Three new Treasures
- Tower of Sweet Chaos: Tray 150 unlocked
- New Cookie Bond story

1. Tropical Soda Islands Campaign has been added.
- Enjoy the new adventures on the Tropical Soda Islands!

2. Trader Touc’s Trade Port has been expanded into a Harbor!

3. 21 Brand-New Sugar Gnome Research Projects!
- 12 Cookie-related technologies & 9 Kingdom-related technologies.

4. Cookie Run: Kingdom’s first LEGENDARY!
Sea Fairy Cookie has been added.

5. Mango Cookie (Epic) has been added.

6. Various bug fixes and improvements.
Various bug fixes and improvements.

- New Cookie: Lilac Cookie (EPIC)
- Introducing new Cookie House Designs
- 24 New Sugar Gnome Laboratory Technologies

- "Giant Squid of the Deep Sea" has appeared in the Tropical Soda Islands!

- New Cookie: Parfait Cookie (EPIC)

- 17 brand-new Sugar Gnome technologies
- Practice Mode in Guild Battle
